title: Universal Declaration of Human Rights - Article 1
speaker: Tauina Lesaa
description: UDHR Article 1 in Tuvaluan (System 4 orthography with macrons)
notes: Audio file must be downloaded separately from source_url
Save as audio.mp3 in this directory
This sample serves as a ground truth benchmark for ASR evaluation

reference_text.system4: E fā'nau mai a tino katoa i te saolotoga kae e 'pau telotolo tūlaga fakaaloalogina mo telotolo aiā. Ne tuku atu ki a lātou a te mafaufau mo te loto lagona, tēlā lā, e 'tau o gā'lue fakatasi lātou e pēlā me ne taina.
reference_text.system6: E fa'nau mai a tino katoa i te saolotoga kae e 'pau telotolo tulaga fakaaloalogina mo telotolo aia. Ne tuku atu ki a latou a te mafaufau mo te loto lagona, tela la, e 'tau o ga'lue fakatasi latou e pela me ne taina.
